name: The tutorial (Inncrediboy)
description:
The tutorial is an intense endless random bullet hell experience. A strange popup appears on your desktop, here the tutorial begins.

There is also a disturbing image in the images folder. If you want to avoid this image, then you should keep away from the Images folder.

PS. There is a glitch with the dialogue section, do not press the buttons before the dialogue is finished.

You'll also notice that this game is extremely rushed.
